name: mystery cat (demo)
description:
MYSTERY CAT is a linear visual novel about a cat lost in a subterranean utopia

writing, art, etc. all by me unless stated otherwise

contains explicit language and partial nudity

this is my first time making a VN,  so this is only a short demo of what i've finished because my brain is very small

this is my entry for the yuri VN CUP 2022

hypercard ren'py framework and hypercard graphics pack by eliot gardepe

thnx please be nice
